items.text: length on off, pushed to extra cover and it's drinks
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short outside off, Sarkar slashes and gets a bottom edge down to third-man for four
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: length outside off, steered to third-man's left, they briefly consider a couple but Tamim turns it down, in the end
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, Tamim flirts with it and is beaten due to the extra bounce
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: wrong line after changing the field, strays onto the pads, turned around towards squareleg for one
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: better this time, length, angled across, teasingt Sarkar, who can't help but fish at it and it narrowly misses the outside edge
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, no run
Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length on middle, stays back and pats it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run
Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short around the hip, picks it up towards deep squareleg with one leg in the air, couple of bounces and straight to the man, though
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short outside off and he goes up and over, upper cutting it for four to third-man's right
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs
Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run
Holder to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: full on the pads, misses the flick but called wide
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: length, angled across, steered to gully
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run
Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs
Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: full on off, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length, angled across, steered to point
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run
Roach to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run
Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs
Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: length on off, pushed to cover
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run
Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
